title: Green bean salad with Stilton croûton

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper
150g/5½oz green beans, topped and tailed, blanched

steps: Place the oil and vinegar into a small bowl, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and whisk together.
Place the green beans into a large bowl, pour over the dressing and stir.
To serve, spread the Stilton over the toasted ciabatta and place on top of the salad.
